title: IOCTL_INTERNAL_MOUSE_DISCONNECT (kbdmou.h)
description: The IOCTL_INTERNAL_MOUSE_DISCONNECT request is completed by Moufiltr with an error status of STATUS_NOT_IMPLEMENTED.
